sentence.text: Direct sequencing revealed a G to T transition (c.886GAAAAT) in exon 9 of the four‑point‑one, ezrin, radixin, moesin domain‑containing 7 (FRMD7) gene, which resulted in a conservative substitution of glycine to cysteine at codon 296 (p.G296C), leading to idiopathic congenital nystagmus in the two affected brothers.
c.886GAAAAT is a novel idiopathic congenital nystagmus‑inducing mutation in the FRMD7 gene.
